data.description: The scope of the Condition Based URIs Selection (CBUS) V1.0 architecture document is to define the architecture for the CBUS Version 1.0 Enabler. The architecture is based on the requirements listed for the Enabler in the CBUS requirement document [CBUS_RD].
The scope of CBUS (Condition Based URIs Selection) Requirements Document (RD) is to define the use cases and requirements for the Condition Based URIs Selection Enabler.

The scope of this document is limited to the Reference Release Definition of CBUS V1.0 Reference Release according to OMA Release process and the Reference Release specification baseline listed in section 5.
